asYouEnterTheApa: ^As you enter the apartment, Lynx looks at you with begging eyes. It's clearly her mealtime.
^You go to the bucket, looking for her pail to fill, worrying about what might happen if you don't find Garret.
^"I will find him for you sweetheart. I promise."
^Though you worried if you could keep it.
^You dig down into the cat food, only to catch on something hard in the center.
^A curious recorder sits inside the bin.
